p: The main physiological function of beta cells is to secrete insulin following glucose exposure. In the current study, two-day treatment of INS-1E cells with a cytokine cocktail reduced glucose-stimulated insulin secretion; however, addition of bergenin significantly restored insulin secretion in beta cells with an EC 50 value of 6.73 Î¼M ( Table 1). These data suggest the beneficial role of bergenin on beta cell insulin secretory function.
